main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Las Vegas, Nevada on July 25, 1965, involving an unidentified object moving northwest.
interesting points: The object was described as having a 17-foot diameter, The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes, Witness estimated the object was traveling at a speed of about 3,235 mph, The object emitted a strange noise and appeared white and bright, It was observed while the sky was dark but clear.
witness description: The witness was outdoors at the time of the sighting.
